entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
